properties.title: Protesters Disrupt Chase Shareholder Meeting
properties.vimeoTitle: People against Chase Bank's financing of Line 3 pipeline, May 21, 2019

properties.title: People Over Pipelines
properties.vimeoTitle: Compilation of speakers from People Over Pipelines event held in Marshfield, WI, Oct. 27, 2017

properties.title: DAPL Security Officers Violently Attack
properties.vimeoTitle: On September 2, 2016, protectors traveled to pray at construction site and found Dakota Access employees unlawfully resuming construction on the 1,120-mile pipe through the treaty territory of the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe.

properties.title: Dirty Secret at the Bottom of the Great Lakes
properties.vimeoTitle: The world's largest crude oil transporter has a secret buried deep in the Great Lakes—two aging oil pipelines that transport 23 million gallons of crude oil through the largest body of fresh water on earth.

properties.title: Nebraska Landowners on Eminent Domain for Private Gain
properties.vimeoTitle: Clips from interviews with Nebraska landowners who faced eminent domain for private gain from TransCanada and its Keystone XL pipeline. Produced by Marty Steinhausen for the Bold Alliance. Interviews conducted by Amy Schaffer and Jeanne Crumly. June 24, 2016

properties.title: Trench Being Dug For Bayou Bridge Pipeline
The Kalamazoo River Oil Spill Disaster
properties.vimeoTitle: Larry Bell of Bell's Brewery and a local homeowner criticize the actions Enbridge took following the oil spill, and address the threat of Enbridge's Line 5 pipeline in the Straits of Mackinac in light of those actions. NWF Great Lakes. June 19, 2017.

properties.title: Break Free PNW-Direct Action Gets The Goods
properties.vimeoTitle: Actions Against Refineries in Anacortes, WA - May 13-15, 2016

properties.title: Keystone XL: Republican ranchers join the fightback in South Dakota
properties.vimeoTitle: After Trump’s revival of the Keystone XL pipeline project, some communities along its route are getting ready to fight back. The Guardian, May 3, 2017.

properties.title: #BreakFree 2016-Midwest Action
properties.vimeoTitle: This escalated action took place in coordination with peaceful mobilizations across six continents under the global platform Break Free, in which ordinary people targeted prominent fossil fuels projects in the name of climate justice. May 15, 2016.

properties.title: #BreakFree2016 Albany, New York
properties.vimeoTitle: Action Against Oil Trains in Albany, New York - May 14, 2016.

properties.title: #BreakFree2016-Kinder Morgan Terminal
properties.vimeoTitle: Protest Against TransMountain Pipeline in Vancouver, BC - May 14, 2016.
